mapper.select: SELECT cls.class_id,cls.class_name,cls.class_status,cls.class_create_time,cls.class_remark,cls.class_major_id,cls.class_grade, m.major_name AS class_major_name,c.college_name AS class_college_name FROM sys_class cls LEFT JOIN sys_major m ON cls.class_major_id=m.major_id LEFT JOIN sys_college c ON m.major_college_id=c.college_id

SELECT cls.class_id,cls.class_name,cls.class_status,cls.class_create_time,cls.class_remark,cls.class_major_id,cls.class_grade, m.major_name AS class_major_name,c.college_name AS class_college_name FROM sys_class cls LEFT JOIN sys_major m ON cls.class_major_id=m.major_id LEFT JOIN sys_college c ON m.major_college_id=c.college_id WHERE class_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT cls.class_id,cls.class_name,cls.class_status,cls.class_create_time,cls.class_remark,cls.class_major_id,cls.class_grade, m.major_name AS class_major_name,c.college_name AS class_college_name FROM sys_class cls LEFT JOIN sys_major m ON cls.class_major_id=m.major_id LEFT JOIN sys_college c ON m.major_college_id=c.college_id WHERE cls.class_grade=#{grade}
